findings.title: A floating pragma is set (SWC-103)
findings.description: The contract uses a floating pragma version which can cause different compilation results between builds.
findings.contract: Ownable.sol, ERC20.sol, ERC20Burnable.sol, ERC20Pausable.sol, Context.sol, IERC20.sol, IERC20Metadata.sol, Pausable.sol

findings.title: Owner can block/unblock user
findings.description: The owner has the capability to block or unblock users.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint an unlimited number of tokens after initial deployment.
